english.segment1: I've got this passion. It's something I can't describe. It's so electric. It's like I've just come alive
english.segment2: I feel this freedom. Now that my past is erased. I feel the healing. I've found the meaning of grace. (I've found grace)
english.segment3: If only You come see me yesterday. Who I used to be before I change. You'd see a broken heart. You'd see the battle scars
english.segment4: Funny how words can't explain. How good it finally feels to break the chains. I'm not what I have done. I'm what I've overcome
english.segment5: I know I stumble. I know I still face defeat. This second chance is. What will define me
english.segment6: So I'm moving forward. I'm standing on my two feet. I've got momentum. I've got someone saving me. (got someone saving me)
english.segment7: If only You come see me yesterday. Who I used to be before I change. You'd see a broken heart. You'd see the battle scars
english.segment8: Funny how words cant explain. How good it finally feels to break the chains. I'm not what I have done. I'm what I've overcome
english.segment9: I make mistakes and I might fall. But I won't break. I've got someone saving me
english.segment10: If only You could see me yesterday. Who I used to be before I change. You'd see a broken heart. You'd see the battle scars
english.segment11: Funny how words cant explain. How good it finally feels to break the chains. I'm not what I have done. I'm what I've overcome. I'm what I've overcome. I'm what I've overcome.
